Reviews.Title: Good buy
Reviews.Author: Tammy Good
Reviews.Content: Just got this and so far it's running smoothly and I was surprised to see that the operating system is actually 4.2.2 Jellybean. This is very comparable and cheaper alternative to the S4. The phone came with earphones an international charger and a usb cable. I am very pleased with this phone I highly recommended it.

Reviews.Title: Samsung Galaxy S Duos 2 - S7582 DUAL SIM - Factory Unlocked - International...
Reviews.Author: Alberto U. Shadah "Tech User"
Reviews.Content: Nice and neat product. I placed a T-Mobile Sim card and it started working nicely.. So far I am very happy with this phone. I hope will last longer than my last Samsung Captivate (lasted 2 months) before going crazy. (the phone of course).I am still configuring all the apps and haven't tried 3G yet. I'll post when done.When I plugged it in on my USB port, it inmediatly, through KIES, did an automatic software update and it was done perfectly.So far, very happy with this phone.

Reviews.Title: very good and satisfied
Reviews.Author: GPawiro
Reviews.Content: Received in good order and am very satisfied in the functioning of the phone. The size of the screen is also in the mid range. Not too big or too small. It works as I expected

Reviews.Title: Samsung got it going on
Reviews.Author: May Monsalve
Reviews.Content: What can I Say about a Samsung mobile phone? Do I really need to say something? lol Works really good

Reviews.Title: Thank you
Reviews.Author: Alex
Reviews.Content: I bought it as a gift. I received it on time and asked AT&T; store to check it.It seems everything is fine and my friend will be happy. ;-)Thank you so much

Reviews.Title: Your money's worth
Reviews.Author: Maxesmart
Reviews.Content: I has everything you need to be connected at a low cost. Definitely it is a good buy... and ole!

Reviews.Title: I am satisfied
Reviews.Author: Courtney Robinson
Reviews.Content: I give this a five star because it is serving the purpose I bought it for.I just could not deal with two phones.

Reviews.Title: Very nice phone
Reviews.Author: OscarD
Reviews.Content: Nice phone, working fine and the dual sim is a plus. Good price also for the specs on this phone.

Reviews.Title: This Samsung is a good phone and I am happy with itl
Reviews.Author: SLeah
Reviews.Content: The phone is exactly what is advertised. It is a good phone that is easy to use. I put Skype and Viber on it and have been using it regularly.

Reviews.Title: good!
Reviews.Author: Gabriel Manuel Vivas Jaspe
Reviews.Content: It is very good product sadly lacking in some wine accessories such as charger and headphones, but like the seller was very responsible to recognize the ball and refund the price of the accessories missing, we recommend for future transactions!

Reviews.Title: Good buy for the price
Reviews.Author: Gerold Daantje
Reviews.Content: The phone performance is as advertised.Cheap but useful. It is a good phone if you are into using a phone for calling and answering.Has some features with basic capabilities.

Reviews.Title: Great phone at a reasonable price
Reviews.Author: L. Carrer
Reviews.Content: The phone came as advertised (unlocked); it was easy to set up an account with T-Mobile. Fast shipping. Plenty of nice features for a beginner smart phone user.

Reviews.Title: Very Good
Reviews.Author: Irenio Vieras
Reviews.Content: As expected. When many programs are installed tends to be slow, but it is normal for the amount of RAM that have. For everything else was excellent. Do not give it 5 stars because I ordered black and they sent me white.

Reviews.Title: Love this phone
Reviews.Author: Ben Culp
Reviews.Content: This is my first smart phone, as such i have stepped out of the dark ages and into modernity.  The superb feature on this phone is it's capability to hold two sim cards.

Reviews.Title: gr8 phone.
Reviews.Author: abisosweet "abisosweet"
Reviews.Content: camera is clear, must go thru a lot of updating b4 u strt using the phone and the 1 question no one answered is the size of sim which i was very concerned about but i must say it works with the normal sim card not the micro sim so it was a gr8 buy for me.

Reviews.Title: this is awesome mobile
Reviews.Author: lia
Reviews.Content: great phone i love it, thanks so much : ) i will buy more mobiles later for my sister an family

Reviews.Title: Very good phone
Reviews.Author: Daniel M.
Reviews.Content: Very good phone, the only problem it's that the user manual is in Romanian... (not in english, not in spanish. Only romanian). And the AC plug is two round connectors, not two right connectors as in the USA.But the phone works OK.

Reviews.Title: less than expected
Reviews.Author: Deanette James
Reviews.Content: This phone is extremely slow. Freezes up so often... unable to make calls or send messages. .. Unable to hear the other party.... so many issues with this phone.

Reviews.Title: Very good experience
Reviews.Author: Amgad Hanna
Reviews.Content: It was good experience the phone is as described very good quality and the price was very good and the very good part is the shipping i got this phone in two days for free with the prime subscription it is worse it

Reviews.Title: excellent
Reviews.Author: Enzo Soto "sotoey"
Reviews.Content: Very good for the price. No complain. Good size. Good respond. Good sounds. Pictures nice. Excellent choice a reasonable price

ProductInfo.Features:
Cellular Band - Quad-Band 850 / 900 / 1800 / 1900 Mhz
Cellular Band 3G - 850 / 2100 Mhz
ProductInfo.Name: Samsung Galaxy S Duos 2 - S7582 DUAL SIM - Factory Unlocked - International Version - Black
